review_text: So far so good. I just started so time will tell if things continue to make this one of the best decisions I‚Äôve made.

Recently, I embarked on a journey to streamline my financial obligations, and the experience left me thoroughly impressed.From the outset, the process was remarkably easy. Gone were the days of drowning in a sea of bills and due dates. Instead, I found myself welcomed by a straightforward application process, where I could consolidate all my debts into one manageable monthly payment or 2 biweekly payments. The online platforms available made it a breeze to input my information, and within no time, I received offer tailored to my needs. What truly set this experience apart was the personalized assistance provided every step of the way. Unlike the impersonal encounters often associated with financial transactions, Freddy guiding me through the consolidation process was attentive, understanding, and genuinely invested in my financial well-being. He took the time to assess my situation comprehensively, offering insightful advice and solutions tailored to my unique circumstances.For anyone struggling to stay afloat amidst a sea of debts, I wholeheartedly recommend exploring the possibilities offered by debt consolidation. It's not just a financial tool; it's a lifeline towards a brighter, debt-free future.Thank you so much Freddy for taking me through the process to change my life!

review_text: I just got off the phone about two hours ago after speaking to Ed M. I‚Äôve had a terrible six months. I lost. My job was so depressed. I had to be hospitalized stopped paying all my bills because I lost almost all of my income after years of loving my job and being loved there. I was just dumped at 70 years old. Dumped. But I have a lot of support so I‚Äôm coming back and now I‚Äôm roaring and ready to go and get myself back online and get another job working until I drop. But now I don‚Äôt have to worry about my debt which has been causing me to be a bit stressed I would say.  Ed calm me down immediately and I trust him totally. I‚Äôm pretty good at figuring out a Kahn artist and he‚Äôs very sincere. He worked very hard. We were on the phone for almost 2 hours, and he listened to all my sad tales, and was very positive. And he also told me how he thinks most are horrible  And they sure don‚Äôt look out for their customers. And he wasn‚Äôt just trying to make me happy. He was trying to tell me that he empathize because he knows that like most of the Americans in big-time debt it‚Äôs not our problem and this company seem to be a solution. I was a banker years ago and I know how  Criminally corrupt some banks are probably most banks. This is one way to get them off your back. Pay them up in a logical way that doesn‚Äôt make you have to scrimp and save to buy food. I haven‚Äôt even made my first payment yet, but I feel totally relieved and I know that I‚Äôm in good hands. If any of that changes, I will definitely let you know. But I feel fully confident that my financial problems at the moment are no longer something for me to worry about  High kudos for Ed and for the screener who spoke to me before I spoke to them. review_text: I just had an experience with TurboDebt that I feel compelled to share. One of their suggestions was to stop making payments to my credit cards temporarily in order to make my financial situation appear worse than it is. This approach not only seemed unethical but also potentially damaging to my credit score and financial future.I was disappointed to see a company advising such tactics instead of offering legitimate and ethical solutions to financial problems. I believe it's important for businesses in this industry to maintain integrity and provide advice that genuinely helps their clients, not strategies that could lead to more harm in the long run.I would caution anyone considering TurboDebt to thoroughly research and consider the potential consequences of their recommendations before proceeding. It's essential to work with a company that prioritizes your financial well-being and provides honest, constructive advice.My secondary concern: they got my social security number and ALL my personal info..... I am very scared!!!!!
review_title: Unethical but also potentially damaging solution

review_text: I was researching online and opening up a mound of "pre-approved" letters that have been piling up and found myself talking to an AI on one of the many browsers I had open and let me know that someone would be calling within 10 min from a specific area code. That alone was impressive. Jordan called on a Sunday afternoon PST and evening for him EST. I told him my situation and that my pre-approvals were getting denied, explained how I got from a 715 credit score to sub par in just a few short months and didn't think I could be helped. He was calm, took me through the process to see what I would qualify for, and was confident through the entire process. I didn't feel ashamed or judged but rather validated that this was the best choice. I am now set up in a program where my number is no longer the one that creditors will be calling. I have a team, including Jordan looking out for me and I'm looking forward to getting back on track.

review_text: I recently had the pleasure of working with TurboDebt, and I must say that my experience exceeded all expectations. From the outset, their customer service was exceptional. The team was not only knowledgeable and professional but also displayed a genuine concern for my financial well-being. They took the time to listen to my concerns and provided personalized guidance every step of the way.The ease of use of TurboDebt's services was particularly impressive. The online platform was intuitive and user-friendly, allowing me to easily input my financial information and to see what options were available to me. The clear and transparent communication from the team made the entire process seamless and stress-free.In terms of effectiveness, TurboDebt delivered on their promise. Their debt solutions were tailored to my specific needs. The expertise and attention to detail they demonstrated instilled confidence in me that I was on the right path to financial freedom.One feature that stood out during my interaction with TurboDebt was their commitment to education. They not only helped me navigate my current financial challenges but also equipped me with some knowledge and tools to make informed decisions in the future.Overall, my experience with TurboDebt has been extremely positive. I highly recommend their services to anyone seeking reliable and effective debt relief solutions. Thank you, TurboDebt, for providing a lifeline during a challenging time.

Jonathan and Colin of Turbo debt clearly explained the program and process of Turbodebt consolidation.This is no scam, not bankruptcy or a loan.They looked at my monthly income and expenses and assessed an amount I could manage to pay into a savings account while I stopped paying my credit cards with the highest balances.  When there is enough money in the savings account the company working with National debit relief, renegotiates a pay off amount with credit card company that radically reduces the 20 to nearly 30 % interest, loan shark rates that need to be better regulated, that you would have had to pay or had to go through bankruptcy because you were in able to pay the accrued interest.

review_text: My problem concerned several credit cards and a Pay Pal account.  Amost all of them were maxed out.  Im 90 and my wife is 74.  We both draw SS payments, and she went back to work in infant care to help us pay our bills on time.  There was no room to breathe.Hunter Stephens took my call, and within minutes I could see that he knew what he could do.  Before the day ended, we had an agreement that would reduce our monthly payout by $700, and get us out of debt within 53 weeks.  He was knowledgeable and could explain it all clearly on his first attempt.  I signed the agreement with great confidence that it was going to make a whole new life for us.
review_title: What a relief!!  Now I can sleep at night.

review_text: I spoke with Cara for nearly 2 hours as she walked me through the severity of my personal situation. From 3 credit cards all with over 5k as well as a nearly 20k loan, the amount of money I made isn't nearly enough to continue making payments on all of this debt as well as pay my day to day bills. I would continue relying on them to pay other bills and the credit card debt would never go down. Cara suggested Debt Reconcilement, which as scary as it is to me, I know is a much better option than bankruptcy. So now I am looking forward to seeing this program through, and excited to see my debt drop and my scores rise. Thank you for your words of encouragement and support through this endeavor, Cara and Turbodebt! See you on the other side!
review_title: Nervous but relieved all at once

I‚Äôm drowning in debt, barely making it payday to payday. My life has become so stressful due to so many bills. While looking for yet another loan (not very smart on my part) I found Turbo Debt, and I‚Äôm so glad I did. I spoke to Derick, and he was very helpful. He spent a lot of time with me, answering questions and explaining how the program works. He was very kind, caring and supportive. After talking for well over an hour, I was tired from a long day and told Derick I needed a little time to do some research and think it over. We set up a time for the next day, Derick called me back, we talked some more and I decided to join. I am a little nervous about starting the process, but I was also nervous about all of my debt. Derick assured me that I would never be alone throughout this process, and has already reached out to me a couple of times. I plan to be debt free in about two years. I would have never been debt free had I continued the way I was. I know this review is a long, but I hope everyone takes the time to read it. Of course I read some of the negative reviews, and to those I say, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry you had a bad experience, and I don‚Äôt know your particular circumstances, but my guess is you unfortunately spoke to someone who just wasn‚Äôt doing their job right.‚Äù Thank you so much for caring, and for your help, Derick!

review_text: I want to thank Nixon for his professionalism and willingness to help me with every question that came to mind each step of the way when completing my agreement for my settlement. I felt the weight of the world on my shoulders. I felt trapped and had no idea how I was going to be able to recover from my financial situation. Nixon made me feel as though he empathized with my situation and truly wanted to try his absolute best to help me personally. It felt so relieving with the trust he managed to build with me and the assurance he provided that everything will be alright. Remember that you are NOT alone, and that there are many other people just like you that are consumed by overbearing debt. Turbo Debt can help to release some of that pressure and put you back on track to regaining control of your life. Life is ALWAYS worth living. Take control of your debt, and do not allow it to continue controlling you instead.
review_title: No matter your situation, you CAN take back control over your finances

I recently decided to swallow my pride and come to the realization that I could no longer keep my head above water. I did my research and found the National Debt relief program, I reached out via live chat and received a phone call from James Williams minutes later. I explained my situation and gave the break down of all of my debt. James was extremely helpful and very personable. After our initial conversation, I made arrangements with James to give me a call back two days later. He texted me the night before making sure I was ready to move forward and even texted me 30 minutes before our scheduled appointment. We went over everything again, he sent the forms while I was on the phone with him and he went over everything in detail and answered all of my questions. I am extremely grateful that a program like this exists and really wasn't too good to be true. I was instantly relieved knowing the fact that I had made the right decision, and I am now on my way to being debt free.

I have been having a lot of restless nights since I got myself in a financial nightmare. After months & months of little to no sleep I was watching TV at around 3am one morning when a commercial came on and caught my attention. It was from Turbo Debt!!  I called the number at that moment and made an appointment to meet with a recruiter the next day.  I had that LIFE SAVING meeting with Spencer Jones.  I was so nervous and scared thinking I had really ruined my life and marriage and credit.  Plus I would never be able to get it all paid off. But Mr. Jones was so very helpful explaining everything along the way that I started to feel like a light was at the end of a tunnel.  My tunnel. He was so calm explaining everything to me and I felt assured that he was very truthful and I believed he would be very helpful.  I have never felt so calm in such a mess that I had done to myself.  I was walked through all the paperwork and explanation of everything making sure I understood the program.  He truly was a Godsend with all of his knowledge.  I think he is a HUGE asset for your company and such a wonderful person with the patience he has.  I hope he is aware of his kindness and professionalism and if I had the  money I would love to give him a bonus myself for the excellent work he did and does.  Thank you so very much Mr. Spencer Jones!!!  God Bless you

I was totally wracked with anxiety over our debt management woes recently and even after doing extensive research on-line and planning to sign up for a debt management plan did not feel that it would provide much relief for our situation. I saw an ad for TurboDebt and thought that it couldn't hurt to see what they would recommend. I completed the online questionaire and was given an appt for a phone call for the following morning. Daniel Fernandez called me and gathered the necessary information not provided in the questionaire and recommended a debt relief company that he thought would be able to provide the most help. He transferred me to that company where we were approved for the assistance. Daniel was the most caring, courteous and professional person that I have spoken to over the phone in the past 5 years. It was so refreshing and a tremendous relief to speak to someone who could provide this level of customer service with patience, empathy and a non-judgemental approach at a time when I was feeling guilty and ashamed about our financial concerns. Within hours of my first call with Daniel, who by the way stayed on the phone with me while I received emails of information and made sure that I understood the process and responsibilities of entering into a program, I finally felt that I could breath easier and that we were going to be able to survive. I know that I will work in the future with NDR as we they help me improve our debt difficulties. But Daniel has also assured me that he will be available to answer any questions/guidance in the future and also. He even called me again the following day to be sure that I was feeling some relief and to make sure that my questions were answered. I am very impressed with this level of excellence in customer service. Something that I rarely see currently. I appreciate it so much and hope that this company will continue to help others as it has helped me.
review_title: Amazing relief provided by the help received from Daniel Fernandez with TurboDebt

It is with great enthusiasm that I write a few words about my experience with TurboDebt.  It was a pleasure working with Zach Tabib as he led the effort to identify my current financial situation.  He presented my debt in easy to understand terms and provided insight explaining the cost and time disadvantages of never making principal payments on my credit card debt.  Zach recommended debt resolution as a means to lower the principal amount and devised a plan to repay my credit card debt in 55 months.  I found Zach to be very knowledgeable regarding debt resolution, and he communicated in a way that was easy to understand.  I found Zach to be very objective when summarizing my debt summary and providing a resolution.  On a personal note, I never thought that my credit card debt could become unmanageable and affect my life in a negative impact.  This can happen to man that makes a 6 figure salary with a 850 credit score.

review_text: Working with Noah from TurboDebt was a great experience.  He was professional, courteous, knowledgeable, friendly, empathetic and best of all was able to help me with my desire to become debt free.The process was easy and also educational. He answered all my questions, and explained each step  as we went through the process to determine if they could help me. Once approved, there were several legal forms to approve. As we read them together he explained what each section meant 'in English'.  I am 70 years old and have had enough experience with legal documents (house, car, appliance purchases) to understand most of what I was reading and I believe his explanations were accurate.With the monthly payment I will be making, I can breathe again! The awful weight of debt that has been growing out of control on my shoulders is now gone. Today I see a light at the end of the tunnel instead of the gigantic monster who has been slowly suffocating me.The journey will not be easy or fun, but it will be worth the time and effort to reach my goal of finally  being debt free.

review_text: I needed to make a decision about resolving debt that had become overwhelming.  I spoke to Donald at TurboDebt who very patiently and kindly listened to my concerns and assisted me in processing an application for debt consolidation with National Debt Relief.
